eng_words_tables.eng_value: from a time in the past until a later time or until now
eng_words_tables.example: The factory had been closed since the explosion.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: to send someone away from a place, often as a punishment
eng_words_tables.example: He was banished to a remote Alaskan island.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: continuing forever or for a long time
eng_words_tables.example: and banished her permanently in the moon.

eng_words_tables.ru: The head of the department has various additional responsibilities.
eng_words_tables.eng_value: something that it is your job or duty to deal with
eng_words_tables.example: The elder sister took on responsibility for both sun and moon

eng_words_tables.eng_value: all the people in a society or family who are approximately the same age | the act or process of reproducing
eng_words_tables.example: This is the story of three generations of women.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: to want to know something or to try to understand the reason for something
eng_words_tables.example: I wonder why she left so suddenly.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: continuing to happen before a particular time or event and then stopping | as far as
eng_words_tables.example: The show will be on until the end of the month. | Carry on until you reach the traffic lights and turn right.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: to get to a particular level, situation, etc | to arrive somewhere
eng_words_tables.example: We won't reach Miami till five or six o'clock.
When he first arrived in New York, he didn't speak a word of English.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: something that happens, especially something important or unusual
eng_words_tables.example: Local people have been shocked by recent events in the town.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: earlier than something or someone | in a position in front of someone or something
eng_words_tables.example: She arrived before me. | The hospital is just before the bridge.

eng_words_tables.ru: просто, всего лишь, только | только что
eng_words_tables.eng_value: only | a very short time ago
eng_words_tables.example: He just wants to win. | I've just been on a trip to France.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: used to talk about how distant something is | a long time
eng_words_tables.example: How far back can you remember? | How far is it to the supermarket?

eng_words_tables.ru: так же как | потому что, поскольку |когда, в то время как, по мере того как
eng_words_tables.eng_value: used to compare two things, people, amounts, etc | because | used to describe two things happening at the same time or something happening at a particular time
eng_words_tables.example: He's not as tall as his brother. | You can go first as you're the oldest. | He was shot in the back as he tried to escape.

eng_words_tables.eng_value: to have or use something at the same time as someone else
eng_words_tables.example: She shares a house with Paul.
